title: The ShowClix
description: Attributes: including a description, whether or not the attribute is required when PUTing or POSTing, a validation rule (either a set of values or a regular expression), and access level denoting the HTTP methods (GET, PUT, POST, DELETE, HEAD, and OPTIONS) available for public and private accessRelationships: including the type of the relationship (belongsTo, hasMany, or belongsToAndHasMany), target class of the relationship, and foreign key usedPermissionsExample usage
